title: The Fast and the Furious 1954 (Action, Crime) John Ireland, Dorothy Malone | Movie

sources.title: The Fast and the Furious 1954 (Action, Crime) John Ireland, Dorothy Malone | Movie
sources.description:
Wanted Man... Meets A Wanting Woman!  
A trucker framed for murder breaks out of jail, takes a young woman hostage, and enters her sports car in cross-border road race hoping to get to Mexico before the police catch him.

Original title: The Fast and the Furious (1954) 

Colorized version https://youtu.be/EOvDpKBBVEE


Directors: John Ireland, Edward Sampson 
Writers: Jerome Odlum, Jean Howell 
Producer: Roger Corman https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYLD4ZQC1D1o3WC_ePvnOng
Cast: John Ireland, Dorothy Malone, Bruce Carlisle 
Genres: Classics, Action, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller
Budget: $66,000

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
